title: Quarto Webr Demo Website
text:
Welcome
Welcome to a demo website that uses quarto-webr to generate interactive code cells using Quarto.
üü° Loading
  webR...

title: Example page
text:
On this page, we set two options directly in the Quarto document. The rest of the options are coming from the _quarto.yml project file. These options are considered ‚Äúglobal‚Äù.
The local options that we enabled are to show the webR status bar and to pre-install the ggplot2 package.
üü° Loading
  webR...


  








Note



If we did not specify the package dependency in the document header, then we would need to add to the code cell the installation command of webr::install('ggplot2') prior to using library(ggplot2).
